title: Flax and Kale
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers mostly vegan with some fish and vegetarian food. Opened in Aug 2014 possibly by the same owners of the veg restaurant Teresa Carles. Bright space with large windows. Food presentation is highly styled. Advisable reserve ahead.
